content: 1 mandala cross-body market bag by knittykittylove on ravelry yarn 280 yards of worsted weight for body of bag 45 yards of worsted weight for strap hook g/4 25 mm gauge does not matter 2 abbreviations chain - chain st - stitch sts - stitches slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet tc - treble_crochet fpdc - front post double_crochet bpdc - back post double_crochet hdc2tog - half_double_crochet 2 sts together decrease - double_crochet 2 sts together dc3tog - double_crochet 3 sts together 3-chain picot - chain 3 slip_stitch in 1st chain note instructions will explicitly say if a chain group counts as a stitch body of bag r1 - make a magic_ring 12 double_crochet into magic_ring slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet pull ring tight 12 double_crochet r2 - ch1 2 single_crochet into each double_crochet around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 24 single_crochet r3 - chain 1 half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet in same stitch 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches * half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet in next stitch 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to 1st half_double_crochet 16 half_double_crochet 8 double_crochet 16 single_crochet r4 - slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet *ch6 slip_stitch in next double_crochet* repeat from * to * around putting the final slip_stitch in the first slip_stitch 8 chain-6 spaces 8 slip_stitch not counting the final slip_stitch r5 - *single_crochet in chain-6 space 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet from r3 work behind the chain-6s single_crochet in same chain-6 space chain 3* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 16 single_crochet 16 double_crochet 8 chain-3 spaces r6 - chain 1 *double_crochet in single_crochet 2 double_crochet in chain-6 space from r4 between the 2 scs double_crochet in next single_crochet 3 double_crochet in chain-3 space* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 56 double_crochet r7 - ch3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next 7 sts *2dc in next st double_crochet in next 7 sts* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning ch3 63 double_crochet r8 - ch3 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st *2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc 1 double_crochet 2dc in next st* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to top of beginning ch3 42 double_crochet 21 fpdc 14 bpdc note you are putting each fpdc around the fpdc below and each bpdc around the bpdc below for both r9 and r10 3 r9 - chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet 1 double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next st *2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts fpdc bpdc fpdc bpdc fpdc
